species.name: zarude
descriptions: Once the vines on Zarude’s body tear off, they become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants of the forest grow.
Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It’s incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.

abilities.name: leaf-guard
abilities.effect: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.
